abstract: Jimmy Carter gives first Sunday school lesson since announcing cancer had spread to his brain; nearly 700 people, some traveling from out of state, gathered to hear the former president encourage reliance on God in face of suffering and adversity in pair of lessons, one at Carter’s Plains, Ga, Baptist church, and second in local high school.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Carter, the 90-year-old former president, taught Sunday school here in his hometown for the first time since he disclosed on Thursday that cancer had spread to his brain.

headline.main: Big Crowds Show Support at Jimmy Carter’s First Bible Lessons Since Cancer Update
headline.print_headline: Big Crowds Show Support at Carter’s First Bible Lessons Since Cancer Update

snippet: Mr. Carter, the 90-year-old former president, taught Sunday school here in his hometown for the first time since he disclosed on Thursday that cancer had spread to his brain.
